definition: to purchase goods (for a company etc)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: He has stocked the shop up very well.
sentences.chinese: 他給商店辦貨辦得很充裕。

sentences.english: Buyer Xiao Li went to Shanghai to purchase goods and can return to the company today.
sentences.chinese: 採購員小李去上海辦貨，今天就能回公司。
